project_abstract.cdata: The Liuzhou Environment Management Project for China aims to improve the environmental conditions in Liuzhou through improved wastewater treatment, sanitation control, solid waste management, and industrial wastewater pollution control. The project has the following five components: Component 1) will help develop a comprehensive wastewater collection and treatment system in Liuzhou. The project will: (a) invest in about 73km of sewers, 76 km of interceptors, seven pumping stations, and four wastewater treatment plants (WWTP); (b) rehabilitate about 42 km of drains; and (c) support operations in the recently established autonomous wastewater management company. Component 2) will construct approximately 62 public toilets and procure 30 portable toilets, two mobile toilets, and six sanitation trucks. Component 3) will construct one municipal solid waste transfer station, 42 waste collection stations, and procure needed waste hauling trucks and associated vehicles to transport waste to the second city landfill. Component 4) will help Liuzhou Municipal Government (LMG) implement comprehensive industrial wastewater pollution control policies and programs. Component 5) includes technical assistance (TA) to: help implement the project's wastewater, solid waste management, and municipal sanitation components.

P081346.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>柳州环境管理项目 </ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目计划通过以下措施协助柳州市政府解决废水污染问题：（1）发展自主经营的公用事业公司，并协助其建立机构框架、财务制度和运行方法；（2）实施工业污染控制规定，并启动工业污染控制改革；（3）投资兴建排污管网、污水处理厂、公共厕所以及垃圾转运站和收集站。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
